event_description: User successfully creates a Stripe subscription for postpaid billing
User completes adding a payment method via Stripe checkout
Account owner sends invitation to a new team member
User accepts a team invitation and joins an account
Account owner removes a team member from their account
User successfully validates a corporate HubSpot deal for prepaid access
User successfully validates a promotional code for free access
User opens the deployment modal to start with Hopsworks
User clicks to sign up or log in via Auth0 from the auth modal
User clicks to access their Hopsworks cluster instance
User copies the quickstart Python code to connect to Hopsworks
User views the billing tab on their dashboard
User deletes their account and revokes all access
User views the landing page, indicating top of conversion funnel
